data_list.title: Join to International Integrated Systems, Inc. (IISI) (2015/09 - 2017/06)
data_list.subTitle: Intelligent Transportation System - Software Engineer
contributions: Implemented the protocal to collect roadside control device's data, including e-Tag, AVI.
Developed the API based on Java RMI, provide vehicle's data to other process server for calculating.

Developed the various vehicle traveling time algorithm against the city or road characteristics, including actual and predictive traveling time, and provide to road user via CMS(Changeable Message Signs).
Constructed system execution environment via Docker, improve the system shifting more efficiently and conveniently.
Developed the RWD website by using jQuery and Bootstrap, use to monitor traveling time of road and status data collecting.
Developed extend information from vehicle's data, such as the slowest and stationary vehicle.

Journal of Liberal Arts and Social Sciences, Vol 13, No.2 (2017-06) - An Adaptive Programming Learning Environment.
